analysis.description:

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x66e0d50864be76f572591d42c5201cadc3b39ff1.sol#300-387):
	External calls:
	- promoCodeBonusAmount = promoCodesContract.applyBonusAmount(msg.sender,purchasedAmount,_promoCode) (/unique_contracts/0x66e0d50864be76f572591d42c5201cadc3b39ff1.sol#315-316)
	- discountPhaseBonusAmount = discountPhasesContract.calculateBonusAmount(purchasedAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x66e0d50864be76f572591d42c5201cadc3b39ff1.sol#316-320)
	- discountStructBonusAmount = discountStructsContract.getBonus(msg.sender,purchasedAmount,msg.value) (/unique_contracts/0x66e0d50864be76f572591d42c5201cadc3b39ff1.sol#321-324)
	- require(bool)(fitsTokensForSaleCap(purchasedAmount.add(bonusAmount).add(referrerBonusAmount))) (/unique_contracts/0x66e0d50864be76f572591d42c5201cadc3b39ff1.sol#338-339)
